name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Delton WOOLFOLK, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Delton WOOLFOLK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The Judgments of Sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lenard H. Sigal, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
431 A.2d 279
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Delton WOOLFOLK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 24, 1981.
Decided July 10, 1981.
Lenard H. Sigal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
